鵺字的基本解释

鵺
yè
古书上说的一种鸟，似雉。

鵺字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yè］
［《廣韻》羊謝切，去禡，以。］
传说中的鸟名。

鵺字的康熙字典解释

【亥集中】【鳥字部】　鵺； 康熙笔画：19； 页码：页1493第01
【廣韻】羊謝切【集韻】夤謝切，?音夜。鳥名。似雉。【山海經】單張山有鳥，如雉，文首，白翼，黃足，名曰白鵺，食之已嗌痛。

鵺字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
鵺字的起名意思

暂无。

鵺
Basic explanation of words
鵺
yè
A kind of bird mentioned in ancient books, resembling a pheasant.
鵺
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yè］
["Guangyun" sheep thank you for cutting, go to 禡, take. ]
The legendary bird name.
鵺
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Hai Collection] [Bird Character Department] 　鵺; Kangxi Strokes: 19; Page Number: Page 1493 01
[Guang Yun] Sheep Xie Qi [Ji Yun] Kui Xie Qi,? Yin Ye. The name of the bird. Like a pheasant. [Shanhaijing] There are birds in the leaflet on the mountain, such as pheasants, literary heads, white wings, and yellow feet. The name is white 鵺, and the food has been painful.
